widget.type: NEW INTERNS  |  NEW FULL TIME EMPLOYEES
widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

config.title: Jorge Contreras
config.description: Hi! I'm Jorge, and I'm 24 years old. I am about to graduate from Computer Systems Engineering. I'm from Saltillo, Coahuila, and I'm mainly interested in front-end web development. I love new challenges, and I also enjoy

config: learning new things. I'm a very happy person who enjoys listening to music, playing the ukulele, and drinking coffee. I like working in teams, meeting new people, and sharing ideas with others. I'm very excited to start this new adventure with Justia, and I plan to give it my best.
